body.name: Apple iPhone 12, 256GB, Blue - Fully Unlocked (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
features: Fully unlocked and compatible with any carrier of choice (e.g. AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint, Verizon, US-Cellular, Cricket, Metro, etc.).
The device does not come with headphones or a SIM card. It does include a charger and charging cable that may be generic.
Inspected and guaranteed to have minimal cosmetic damage, which is not noticeable when the device is held at arm's length.
Successfully passed a full diagnostic test which ensures like-new functionality and removal of any prior-user personal information.
Tested for battery health and guaranteed to have a minimum battery capacity of 80%.
body.description: Apple iPhone 12 comes with a 6.1-inch OLED display, 5nm Apple A14 Bionic processor, and a dual-camera setup with a large sensor. 5G and Face ID are also standard features along with True Tone support for adjusting the white balance to the ambient lighting, and wide color support for true-to-life colors. The iPhone 12 is available in six different colors: White, Black, , (PRODUCT)RED, Purple, Blue and Green.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m Impressed! Like New!!
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with the condition of this refurbished phone. I have had this phone for almost a year and it works great. I have had no issues with this phone. The battery works great! The screen and back look brand new. All the device functions work as they should. All the buttons, face recognition, sound, and display work as expected. They have no scratches or cracks. I honestly would’ve thought this phone was brand new if it was listed as brand new. I was skeptical at first, but I am so glad I decided to purchase this phone. I saved a lot of money going with this option. I will be recommending this product to any friends who are looking for a new phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When Buying Second Hand...
reviews.reviewText: When buying a second hand device, the ratings: Used Like New, Used Very Good, Used Good and Used Acceptable are important. Your device will look a certain way depending on what you choose. With that said, different suppliers may have a subjective take on what each of these means.Pros: Having never owned an iPhone before, this thing blew me away in spite the slight cosmetic imperfections. Its beautiful and I love it. And it was affordable!-Every thing works well. I got the 128gb version. Great sound, great screen, great experienceCons: The learning curve if this is your first time using iOS. Granted, you will experience this no matter what version iPhone you get. Things work differently here. Not so much that you cant adapt but enough to frustrate.-Battery life was at 86% which though good, was scary. 14% is a lot were I come from.-Those cosmetic scratches took me aback, then I remembered I chose USED: ACCEPTABLE. That humbled me real quick. With that said, still love it, bought a case already.-If you have already experienced a device with 120Hz refresh rate, this will throw you off. You might get disappointed. If you haven't, then great!-Also, if you are stepping down from a more advanced iPhone and short on cash, buying second hand is as you have more choices. But, you will always be reminded someone used it before you so make sure you are already comfortable buying on the second hand market.-Still haven't gotten rid of my android. Was going to but after the learning curve on iPhone, I think having both phones is the better choice. Sorry Tim Cook...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, shipped fast!
reviews.reviewText: My iPhone SE 2nd gen very suddenly bit the dust after 3 years and I needed a new device FAST! I didn’t want to drop close to $1K on a new phone but still wanted to upgrade from my much older previous phone. My iPhone 12 arrived within a few business days. My only complaints are that the third party charger that was sent along did not work, but thankfully I already had several iPhone compatible chargers in my home. The battery health is at 80% but I expected about that much as it is a used device. So far a full charge with moderate use (listening to music, checking social media and texts) lasts me a whole workday anyways. Besides, even getting a new battery eventually would still be a lot cheaper than buying new from Apple and I felt really confident in Amazon to give me a refund in the event the phone was not in working order. Thankfully, everything functions fantastic! I ordered a T-mobile locked one and then just swapped over my SIM, and it updated on my plan immediately to reflect the new phone. Overall I would absolutely buy from Amazon renewed again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy phone
reviews.reviewText: The shipping has a hick up but got it sorted. It came within the shipping timeframe. It looks brand new. No dents or scratch. Everything works fine. The touch works, Face ID, Siri and all the normal features. The battery health is 100%. And it holds charge for the entire day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The phone I have purchased is in perfect working condition.
reviews.reviewText: The phone came with little minor scratches but it comes with a screen protector so the screen itself is not damaged. It works perfectly fine and it also came with 100 max battery life which is amazing. The speaker for the phone is perfect no static. It does come a little dirty but you can just easily wipe it off. For the price of this phone and the excellent condition which is like brand new is amazing. I would totally recommend purchasing from this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s better than expected. It had one tiny scratch on the left side of the charging port everything else was pretty good. The only thing that I bought was an original charger, the generic one wasn’t charging it as it should. Battery health was 88%, so very decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for a friend new to the iPhone world
reviews.reviewText: I've had iPhones for over a decade. This one the sound doesn't seem to be as loud as I'd expect, even when you put it on speaker phone.Touchscreen works really well. We got a protector for it to prevent scratches, as well as a phone cover. I consider those standard accessories for any phone.Overall battery life is fair. It is a reconditioned phone, and for a price you can get a new battery installed by someone else, or do it yourself. I've done both. Thankfully Apple has a way for you to tell if the battery is shot. This one was about 20% used, and won't go above that.Easy enough to have an external battery with you.As my friend is new to the iPhone world, he had some questions. Most things he figured out himself, even though he's not technically apt. At all.Facial recognition works really well. I like that it allows you to put in (2) faces. Either one of you without a mask, and one with ... or another person. It doesn't really care.I also like that Apple doesn't send that facial data anywhere. It stays in the phone.
Me gusto cumplió con mis expectativas, hasta con mica me llegó, entrega al otro día, todo funcionando correctamente, solo pequeños detalles, pero con la funda lo cubre, recomendando 100%
Funciona bien. Estética del producto muy buena
Está muy bien conservado , no se le notan arañazos. La batería está al 87 %.Comparado con mi anterior teléfono es bastante mejor. Funciona muy bien
Todo perfecto, estética de 10 ni un rallon ni golpe y condición de batería al 100%

Me encantó, solo traía unos pequeños rayones en los Marcos de las cámaras además de un golpecito en la esquina superior, la pantalla tenía pocos rayones visibles, lo que lo hizo excelente es que venía la batería al 100, no he tenido ningún problema y todo funciona excelente 🙌
